ygData.msgSnippet: * Suddenly everything happened all at once, something that was a complate surprise to her. Before she knew what she was doing BrightBlade had ripped her hand

* Suddenly everything happened all at once, something that was a complate 
surprise to her.
Before she knew what she was doing BrightBlade had ripped her hand from 
Grimmlers grasp, sending the cuffed fist towards the side of his head.
The mind controle had broken.
She swong her fist towards Grimmler with a growl.*

" Stop! You fool! What in the Pit do you think you're doing?!!"

* Now she knew, knew that she was a Predacon and one that had to escape and 
get back to the base.
And she also knew that Grimmler didn't love her, thinking that it must have 
been something that some dolt forced into both of their minds.
But there was one thing for sure, she had to get away. AND, if she ever 
caught the bot who had done this to her he would had wished that he had 
never come online!
With a growl BrightBlade spun towards Smokescreen, her hand still in the 
cuffs but not really caring.
She had to get away, and it seemed as if the only way was through the front 
door.
Without a single glance she sprang for the door, easily side-stepping 
Smokescreen and running out into the hall.
Whether it be quto defences or armed bots, she had to get through them and 
away from this base.
BrightBlade opened her com-link to Perndabot.*

" Perndabot. I'll be out in a nano-click. Be ready, you'll have a few bots 
to fire at."

* With that she whirled around and scanned, locating the exit to the ship 
and any other possable escape rouites.
She HAD to get out!*
